item.title: Powered by India’s small businesses, UK fintech Tide becomes a TPG-backed unicorn
item.description: Tide serves over 1.6 million micro and small enterprises globally, with more than half of them based in India.

item.title: Silicon Valley bets big on ‘environments’ to train AI agents
item.description: A wave of startups are creating RL environments to help AI labs train agents. It might be Silicon Valley’s next craze in the making.

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: The two robotaxi battlegrounds that matter
